name: Gallagher

traceMaterials.itemName: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

story: A security officer of the Bloodhound Family at Penacony. He is always courteous toward visiting guests but keeps his vigilance about him. He seems to carry a weight of a complicated past, yet he never voluntarily divulges any details.

skills.name: Corkage Fee
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Champagne Etiquette
skills.description: Inflicts Besotted on all enemies and deals Fire DMG to them at the same time. Enhances the next Basic ATK to Nectar Blitz.

skills.name: Tipsy Tussle
skills.description: The Besotted state makes targets receive more Break DMG. Every time the target gets attacked by an ally, the attacker's HP is restored.

skills.name: Artisan Elixir
skills.description: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, inflicts Besotted to all enemies and deals minor Fire DMG to all enemies.

skills.name: Nectar Blitz
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy and reduces ATK.

eidolons.name: Salty Dog
eidolons.description: When entering the battle, Gallagher regenerates 20 Energy and increases Effect RES by 50%.

eidolons.name: Lion's Tail
eidolons.description: When using the Skill, removes 1 debuff(s) from the target ally. At the same time, increases their Effect RES by 30%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Corpse Reviver
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Last Word
eidolons.description: Extends the duration of the Besotted state inflicted by Gallagher's Ultimate by 1 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Death in the Afternoon
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Blood and Sand
eidolons.description: Increases Gallagher's Break Effect by 20% and Weakness Break Efficiency by 20%.
